title: Duck do-piaza
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) onions', '700 g (1 lb 9 oz) duck breasts', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '2 bay leaves, crumbled', '4 green cardamom pods, split open at the top', '5 cm (2 in) cinnamon stick, broken in half', '4 cloves', '½ - 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons garlic purée, or crushed garlic', '2 teaspoons ginger purée, or grated ginger', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon turmeric', '125 g (4½ oz) canned chopped tomatoes', 'Salt', '½ teaspoon garam masala', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', 'To garnish: chopped fresh coriander, sliced cucumber and red onion']
